name: Empty Battery
description:
You have a game that should be on Gamejam. Eventually, you finish the game and now it's ready to go.  However, the computer's battery is dead. You have to charge it regularly otherwise, your computer will shut itself down! 

 But be careful! You can break the generator. when generating electricity. 

Also,  pay attention to the deadline   You must upload the game before 07:00!

Note :  Watch out for the lights. Otherwise you will run into problems.

Control: Only Mouse
